code: @Override public RestChannelConsumer prepareRequest(RestRequest restRequest, NodeClient client) throws IOException {     Tuple<XContentType, BytesReference> sourceTuple = restRequest.contentOrSourceParam().     SimulatePipelineRequest request = new SimulatePipelineRequest(sourceTuple.v2(), sourceTuple.v1()).     request.setId(restRequest.param("id")).     request.setVerbose(restRequest.paramAsBoolean("verbose", false)).     return channel -> client.admin().cluster().simulatePipeline(request, new RestToXContentListener<>(channel)). }
